name: nobody cares
content: You said you care like you do care
你轻声关切 这关切 如是所闻
You said you care like you do care
你轻声关切 这关切 如是所闻
像沦陷在沙发中的布偶 不想从这欢愉中回头
如此尽兴 尽情享受
熄灭最后一盏灯 我隐身无尽黑暗
Don't you say no to someone
Don't you stay known in no time
Don't you say no to someone
Don't you stay known in no time
You said you care like you do care
你轻声关切 这关切 如是所闻
